description: SourceAI is an AI-powered tool that can generate code in any programming language from any human language description. It can also simplify, find errors and fix them and debug your code.
title: SourceAI | AI-Powered Code GeneratorMenu
keywords: Code Generator, Codex, GPT-3, Copilot, SourceAI, Source AI
introduction: SourceAI is a commercial software powered by GPT-3 and Codex, offering AI-powered code generation for developers and non-developers.
features: Easy: Open to all (even for non-developers), straightforward and simple to use, clear and intuitive interface.
Fast: Save time in development, generate your code in one-click, use your time more efficiently.
AI-Powered: Powered by GPT-3 and Codex, the most advanced AI technology, next-generation development.
pricing: The pricing is calculated based on the total number of tokens needed to instruct the model on how to perform the operation, plus the tokens in the query and the tokens generated by the API.

faqs.question: Is SourceAI commercial software?
faqs.answer: Yes, SourceAI is a commercial software.

faqs.question: What is a token?
faqs.answer: For regular English text, 1 token is approximately 4 characters. To further understand the tokens required for your API calls, you can use the Token Estimator.

faqs.question: Do prompt tokens also count against my quota?
faqs.answer: Yes, both prompt and completion tokens are included in the total number of tokens used by a request.

faqs.question: What API engine do we use?
faqs.answer: We are using Davinci engine. Davinci is the most capable engine and can perform any task the other models can perform and often with less instruction. For applications requiring a lot of understanding of the content, Davinci is going to produce the best results.
